```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.linalg import diagsvd
>>> vals = np.array([1, 2, 3])  # The array representing the computed svd
>>> diagsvd(vals, 3, 4)
array([[1, 0, 0, 0],
 [0, 2, 0, 0],
 [0, 0, 3, 0]])
>>> diagsvd(vals, 4, 3)
array([[1, 0, 0],
 [0, 2, 0],
 [0, 0, 3],
 [0, 0, 0]]) 
```
